DOC.brief_summary: Purple Sweet Potato juice ( PSP-juice ) juice base purple-fleshed sweet potato concentrate , contain high level anthocyanins . Purple-fleshed sweet potato attract attention industry scientist due multiple physiological function radical-scavenging , ACE-inhibitory α-glucosidase inhibitory activity vitro , also hepato-protective , antihypertensive antihyperglycemic effect vivo . Previous study Japanese subject show potential beneficial effect PSP beverages liver function blood pressure volunteer impair hepatic function and/or hypertension . The main objective study examine effect PSP-juice liver enzymes blood pressure . The secondary objective examine effect PSP-juice juice insulin resistance .

DOC.detailed_description: Study design : The study design randomize , parallel , placebo-controlled , double-blind study . Study population : 40 healthy adult female and/or male subject , 40-70 yr old BMI 25-35 kg/m2 , mildly elevate serum liver enzyme , high normal blood pressure mild hypertension . Intervention : Daily oral intake 3x 125 ml PSP-juice control juice period 8 week . Main study parameters/endpoints : Liver enzyme ( GGT , ALAT , ASAT ) , blood pressure , glucose , insulin , haematology serum clinical chemical profile
